mapper.select: SELECT sl.*, st.num as num, sg.score as score, sg.right_num as rightNum, sd.`name` as name, DATE_FORMAT( sg.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS createTime FROM sg_theme_award_log sl JOIN sg_theme st ON sl.theme_id = st.id JOIN sg_theme_answer_log sg ON sl.answer_id = sg.id JOIN sys_dictionary sd ON sl.award_code = sd.id where sl.user_id = #{model.userId} order by st.num desc
